info.name: Gmail - Stripped
info.description: Make Gmail a clean distraction-free environment.
info.additionalInfo:
History
08/30/12 - Standardized fonts of quoted text in replies
08/22/12 - Standardized fonts of signatures and quotes
05/02/12 - Fixed hide footer
04/27/12 - Standardized fonts of incoming emails
04/25/12 - Handled google update, removed google logo
02/15/12 - Handled google update, removed google logo
12/28/11 - Removed bottom ads
11/12/11 - Updated for changes to html structure
11/05/11 - Removed label links, calendar links, and photos
11/04/11 - Added changes for new UI
06/03/11 - Removed "Import mail and contacts" link
05/19/11 - Removed top menu
05/03/11 - Removed trailing star from "Starred" folder
02/23/11 - Removed search buttons 
01/11/11 - Fixed removal of "Refresh" link and bottom select menu
10/03/10 - Removed "About these links"
09/12/10 - Removed "30 days notice" at top of Trash folder 
09/08/10 - Removed "expand folder" buttons for "Mail" and "Contacts" folders
09/07/10 - Removed trailing star from "Starred" folder
